rule.name: reportDateField
rule.definition: =load( local!value: today(), local!start, local!end, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Start Date", instructions: "Setting this field will change End Date to be one week later", value: local!start, saveInto: { local!start, local!end << fn!todate <<fn!caladddays(_,5) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "End Date", instructions: "Must be one week after Start Date", value: local!end, saveInto: local!end, validations: if( and(not(isnull(local!end)), not(isnull(local!start)), not(todate(fn!caladddays(local!start,5))=todate(local!end))), "End Date must be 7 days after start date", "" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( value: null(), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "No Instructions", saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( instructions: "No Label, with instructions", saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Label And Instructions", instructions: "Instructions", saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Default Value", instructions: "Date should be 15 April 2011", value: date(2011,4,15), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Default Read-only", instructions: "Date should be 25 December 2011", value: date(2011,12,25), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Default from Constant", instructions: "Date should be 20 July 2011", value: #"_a-0000d4ad-7831-8000-bfb8-680000680000_1376", saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Default from date and time constant", instructions: "Date and time should be 20 December 2012 at 3 am. The time should fall off.", value: toDate(#"_a-0000d4ad-7831-8000-bfb8-680000680000_1377"), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Read-only, No Default", readOnly: true, saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Disabled, No Default", disabled: true, saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Default Read-only and Disabled", disabled: true, readOnly: true, instructions: "Default is 17 April 2014", value: date(2014,4,17), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Default Value set from today()", value: today(), saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Required", required: true, saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Invalid Value (Not a Date)", value: "abcdefg", instructions: "Input is abcdefg", saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Null Input", value: null(), instructions: "Input is null()", saveInto: local!value ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Validation", value: null(), instructions: "There should be two validation messages here", validations: { "Validation error message", "Another validation error message" }, saveInto: local!value ) }, secondColumnContents: { 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Enter Date", instructions: "align: not configured", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Enter Date", instructions: "align: null", align: null, value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Enter Date", instructions: "align: LEFT", align: "LEFT", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Enter Date", instructions: "align: CENTER", align: "CENTER", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Enter Date", instructions: "align: RIGHT", align: "RIGHT", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Disabled Date", instructions: "align: not configured", disabled: true, value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Disabled Date", instructions: "align: null", disabled: true, align: null, value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Disabled Date", instructions: "align: LEFT", disabled: true, align: "LEFT", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Disabled Date", instructions: "align: CENTER", disabled: true, align: "CENTER", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Disabled Date", instructions: "align: RIGHT", disabled: true, align: "RIGHT", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Read-only Date", instructions: "align: not configured", readOnly: true, value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Read-only Date", instructions: "align: null", readOnly: true, align: null, value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Read-only Date", instructions: "align: LEFT", readOnly: true, align: "LEFT", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Read-only Date", instructions: "align: CENTER", readOnly: true, align: "CENTER", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ), 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}DateField'( label: "Read-only Date", instructions: "align: RIGHT", readOnly: true, align: "RIGHT", value: local!value, saveInto: local!value ) } ) )
